name: Bay Leaves
properties: Aromatic herb used for depth of flavor
Used in Mediterranean and European cooking
benefits: Bay leaves add a subtle, complex flavor to long-cooking dishes like soups, stews, and bean dishes. They contain anti-inflammatory compounds and have been traditionally used to support digestion. Bay leaves are removed before serving but infuse dishes with their aromatic properties during cooking.
amount: 1-2 bay leaves per pot of soup or stew (remove before serving)
